title: NEWS: County joins the focus on hate crime (Northumberland County Council)
text: ( Source : Northumberland County Council ) 09 October 2015 Northumberland County Council is giving its full support to the national Hate Crime Awareness Week . The week runs from Saturday 10th October to Saturday 17th October and aims to tackle
